name: Traffic Frenzy
description:
Traffic Frenzy is a game where you control a car moving down an endless highway, trying to avoid the oncoming cars without violently crashing. 

You can drive a van, be a truck diver or pilot a race car; there are eight different fully drivable vehicles you can buy with enough money -- which is gathered by exiting the garage and driving down the endless road.

There are only two simple controls: turn right or turn left. You won't be able to stop or turn around at the highspeed you move at without flipping the car over. You will drive across bridges, through tunnels, down city streets... forever. At least, until you're dead...
